feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T12:01:10.849383Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Unicode 字符“𝕏”(U+1D54F)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 24T11:22:54.477496Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F"/>; <author>; <name>;t0m44c</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=t0m44c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;U+1D54F 是字符 Mathematical 的 unicode 十六进制值Double-Struck Capital X. Char U+1D54F，编码，HTML 实体：𝕏、𝕏、𝕏、UTF-8（十六进制）、UTF-16（十六进制）、UTF-32（十六进制）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unicode-character-u-1d54f" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846076" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让谈判脱题的“三件事”练习（2011）</stitle>; <id>;https://math.stanford.edu/~vak il/thirdthings.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T03:00:54.581350Z</更新>; <link href="https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; “三件事”练习是一种从谈话中提取有价值信息的方法。目标是将演讲中的三个关键要点写在一张纸或索引卡上。这些要点可以是定理、激发问题、问题或演讲中突出的任何其他内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the- Three-things-exercise-for-getting-things-out-of-talks-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Debian riscv64</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T02:00:54.583067Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-ris cv64.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;经过多年的努力，Debian riscv64现已成为官方架构。该端口需要重新启动、修复错误并重新安装构建守护程序，然后才能发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-riscv64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;C89 编译器从 C 代码生成可打印的可执行文件 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T08:00:54.583836Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;G3"1pfu nuaj x4(plxd$@$ 49p%@ g!e xg1e "j"x4"ph dxd4,,zp% @!. '' - a j-x4, bj, cy & z-z',/() <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#c89-compiler- Produces-printable-executables-from-c-code-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821985" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;显示 HN：我的笔绘图之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:00:54.584532Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments"/>; <author>; <name>;adamfuhrer</name>; <uri>;https://new s.ycombinator.com/user?id=adamfuhrer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.adamfuhrer.com/assets/images/main-gradient.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;多伦多前端工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-pen-plotting-journey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;死亡金属英语 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:00:54.585252Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/ Death-metal-english/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cdme</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cdme</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/23/suffocation-thumb-e1383930752525-1052 x592.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Vastum 的死亡金属英语歌词涉及色情和性，使用残酷和夸张的隐喻。死亡金属乐队使用死亡金属英语让他们的歌词听起来更残酷，并唤起邪恶感。死亡金属英语的特点是使用大词、形容词、介词短语、进行时、被动语态、古老或伪圣经的措辞、夸张的隐喻和不合逻辑或无意义的句子。它可以应用于任何主题，将普通的短语变成病态的死亡金属歌曲。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#death-metal-english-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T10:00:54.585920Z</已更新>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/"/>; <作者>; <name>;pallas_athena</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pallas_athena</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/ 2023/07/x-twitter.jpg?w=730" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”。Twitter 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克宣布了徽标更改，并暗示 Twitter 品牌将进一步发生变化。马斯克对字母“X”的痴迷是众所周知的，因为他创立了多家名称中带有“X”的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HP 45（以及 35 和 80）计算器模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https:// sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T04:00:54.586588Z</更新>; <link href="https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;linsomniac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=linsomniac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sarahkmarr.com/hp1973Window.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;HP-1973 是一个基于 Python 的计算器模拟器，可以运行 HP-45、HP-35 和 HP-80 计算器的 ROM 代码。它提供带有各种自定义选项的 GUI 界面，并提供有关计算器内部工作原理的详细帮助。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hp-45-and-35-and-80-calculator-emulator" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842839" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么框架向前倾斜（2015）</stitle>; <id>;https://chcollins.com/100B illion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T22:00:54.587275Z</更新>; <link href="https://chcollins.com/100Billion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/"/>; <作者>; <name>;theospears</name>; <uri>;https://news.illion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/</id>; ycombinator.com/user?id=theospears</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://chcollins.com/100Billion/wp-content/uploads/hang-tension3-300x218.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 160px;" />;<br />;当电线连接到框架背面且框架质心位于该点之前时，框架会向前倾斜。质心距离框架后部越远，扭矩越大，框架倾斜越多。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-frames-tilt-forward-2015" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840282" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;询问 HN：正在寻找用于语音控制操作的 Firefox 兼容扩展</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item？ id=36844415</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T09:00:54.588004Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844415"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bryanrasmussen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bryanrasmussen</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;基本上我想要一个扩展，我可以在其中说“单击发布”它会找到带有文本发布的按钮并单击它。我问 FF 有类似的东西吗，因为 FF 语音库几年前就被关闭了，还没有找到竞争对手。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-looking-for-a-firefox-兼容-extension-for-voice-control-actions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Llama2.c：在一个纯 C 文件中推理 llama 2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:00:54.589549Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c" />; <author>; <name>;anjneymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjneymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/llama2.c/master/assets/llama_cute.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件中，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。 C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ldd 任意代码执行 (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:00:54.590243Z</updated>; <link href="https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution"/>; <author>; <name>;xk3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xk3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://catonmat.net/images/catonmat-logo-clean.png" style="width: 220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;ldd 实用程序可用于确定可执行文件的动态库依赖项，但也可被利用来运行任意代码。本文探讨了此漏洞并提供了获取系统管理员权限的社会工程场景。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ldd-centric-code-execution-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839800" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;美国参议院通过 DEA 制定的法案旨在实现端到端加密</stitle>; <id>;https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T01:00:54.590911Z</updated>; <link href="https://therecord.media/ Senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs"/>; <author>; <name>;walterbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/Suzanne_Smalley_27e80bc465 .png?w=3840" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;一项要求社交媒体公司、加密通信提供商和其他在线服务向美国缉毒局 (DEA) 报告其平台上的毒品活动的法案已提交参议院审议。该法案引起了隐私倡导者的担忧，他们认为该法案将公司变成了事实上的缉毒机构，并威胁到端到端加密。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-senate-bill-crafted-with-dea-targets-end-to-end-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841369" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;年轻人纷纷涌向占星术</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:00:54.591566Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost .com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://s3.amazonaws.com /arc-authors/washpost/746a8401-ccc8-492d-986e-b24f68639b61.png&w=196&h=196" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;占星学领域在年轻一代的推动下正在蓬勃发展，到2021年价值将达到128亿美元。许多人转向占星学来寻求自我完善和个人成长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#young-people-are-flocking-to-astrology" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840674" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;李小龙和我</stitle>; <id>;https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:00:54.592223Z</updated>; <link href="https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me"/>; <author>; <name>;yla92</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yla92</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f19 825b-4e4c-4b40-a089-f0848ed5362a_1080x1080.jpeg”样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;五十年前，卡里姆·阿卜杜勒·贾巴尔得知李小龙去世的消息，这对他打击很大，因为李小龙不仅是他的武术老师，也是他的亲密朋友。阿卜杜勒-贾巴尔描述了他多年来所经历的巨大损失，并反思了如果李小龙没有在 32 岁时去世，他会如何生活。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bruce-lee-and-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843514" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inkscape 1.3</stitle>; <id>;https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T07:00:54.5941 61Z</updated>; <link href="https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Reventlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Reventlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.inkscape.org/media/news/upload s/about-screen-contest-1-3-splash.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：83px；" />;<br />;Inkscape 推出 1.3 版，重点是高效组织工作 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inkscape-1-3" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843794" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;乐观、傲慢和战略失实陈述</stitle>; <id>;https://albertcory50.substack.com/p/optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:00:54.594817Z</updated>; <link href="https://albertcory50 .substack.com/p/optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation"/>; <author>; <name>;AlbertCory</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=AlbertCory</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive：陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F5a8d3ec6-3b5c-43cc-9a58-ea15560c9dea_1920x700.png" style="width: 220px; height: 81px;" />;<br />;IT 项目常常是灾难，预算超支和失败。这些问题并非计算机项目所独有，而是由人性和政治因素造成的。乐观、傲慢和战略误述是这些失败背后的部分原因。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843136" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nulls Nullified (2005)</stitle>; <id>;http://www.dbazine.com/ofinterest/oi-articles/pascal27/</ id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:00:54.595455Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.dbazine.com/ofinterest/oi-articles/pascal27/"/>; <author>; <name>;declanhaigh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=declanhaigh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;该文章批评缺乏数据库从业者对数据基础知识的了解，以及行业出版物和学术界缺乏基础知识的情况。它特别批评了 SQL 数据库中 NULL 的使用，认为 NULL 违反了关系模型并导致不正确的查询结果。该文章建议缺失或不适用的值应进行关联处理，而不使用 NULL。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nulls-nullified-2005" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825668" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;从 UUID 到无限循环（2015）</stitle>; <id>;https://susam.net/blog/from-uuid-to-infinite-loops.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:00:54.596104Z</updated>; <link href="https://susam.net/blog/from-uuid-to-infinite-loops.html"/>; < author>; <name>;susam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=susam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;UUID 或通用唯一标识符是 128 位标识符，通常表示为 32 个十六进制数字。版本 4 UUID（也称为随机 UUID）不需要外部输入，并且其十六进制表示形式具有某些固定模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#from-uuid-to-infinite-loops-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821736" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;古斯塔夫·莫罗的神秘画作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:00:54.596907Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/"/>; <author>; <name>;棱柱形</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.thecollector.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/gustave-moreau-paintings.jpg?width=1400&quality=70" style="width: 220px; height: 127px;" />;<br />;古斯塔夫·莫罗以传统学院派画家的身份开始了他的职业生涯，并在巴黎沙龙展出。在一系列负面评论之后，这位艺术家退出了社会，七年没有崭露头角。他重返巴黎艺术界后所展示的辉煌而梦幻的画作震惊了评论家，并激励了新一代艺术家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gustave-moreau-s-mystical-paintings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832191" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;眼镜熊的惊人匮乏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/surprising-dearth-spectacled-bears</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T03:00:54.597753Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/surprising-dearth- spectacled-bears"/>; <author>; <name>;samclemens</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samclemens</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/dickie_inset_1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 185px;" />;<br />;帕丁顿熊是迈克尔·邦德创作的深受喜爱的角色，原本以非洲为背景，但由于非洲缺乏熊，不得不改为南美。在南美丛林中发现的眼镜熊成为帕丁顿熊的灵感来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-surprising-dearth-of-spectacled-bears" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;育碧帐户（包括游戏）可因不活动而永久删除</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:00:54 .598538Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/"/>; <作者>; <name>;yabatopia</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yabatopia</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/KXhtHDz2BcAgX7KYcVgLCJ-320-80.jpg”样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：123像素；” />;<br />;让育碧帐户处于非活动状态太长时间会导致其面临被永久删除的风险。育碧支持人员确认了一封电子邮件的合法性，该电子邮件通知用户因不活动而关闭帐户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ubisoft-account-include-games-can-be-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843572" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;教你的法学硕士用事实而非虚构来回答</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.myscale.com/2023/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:00:54.599357Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.myscale.com/ 2023/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jinqueeny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jinqueeny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.myscale.com/assets/img/chatgpt-hallucination-response.435cec3e.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：122 像素；" />;<br />;大型语言模型 (LLM) 是先进的人工智能系统，可以回答广泛的问题。然而，他们可能会对不熟悉的话题做出不准确的反应，这被称为幻觉。为了提高法学硕士的准确性，在查询中添加事实和支持文档非常重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-your-llm-to-answer-with-facts-not-fiction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840728" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Icon Buddy – 100K+ 开源 SVG 图标，完全可定制</stitle>; <id>;https://iconbuddy.app/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:00:54.601164Z</updated>; <link href="https://iconbuddy.app/"/>; <author>; <name>;mddanishyusuf</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mddanishyusuf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://iconbuddy.app/icongroup-2-left.png" style="width: 220px; height: 173px;" />;<br />;我们有多种格式可供选择，因此您可以下载您想要的格式的图标。我们有 SVG、PNG、WEBP、JSX、VUE 和 BASE64、URL、CSS 背景截图、HTML 图像标签。我们拥有一切。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#icon-buddy-100k-open-source-svg-icons-very-customizable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837442" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;VirtualBox 7.0.10 下载链接已消失</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:00:54.602073Z</updated>; < link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads"/>; <author>; <name>;trashburger</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=trashburger</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.archive.org/web/20230723 100309im_/https://www.virtualbox.org/graphics/vboxlogodown.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：77px；" />;<br />;如果您正在寻找最新的 VirtualBox 6.1 软件包，请参阅 VirtualBox 6.1 版本。版本 6.1 将继续受支持到 2023 年 12 月。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#virtualbox-7-0-10-download-links-have-disappeared" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841272" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现在加州的所有寄养儿童都可以免费进入任何州立大学</stitle>; <id>;https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:00:54 .603002Z</updated>; <link href="https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free"/>; <作者>; <name>;pessimizer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pessimizer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.the messenger.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/UCLA-143309512.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;根据本周签署的法律，加州各地寄养的儿童和青少年将能够免费就读州立大学和社区大学。新的“寄养未来”计划将拨款 2500 万美元，用于支付就读加州州立大学、加州大学或社区学院的寄养青少年的学费。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839983" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纹理编码的计算复杂性</stitle>; <id>;https://fgiesen.wordpress.com/2023/07/21/computational-complexity-of-texture-encoding/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:00:54.603881Z</updated>; <link href ="https://fgiesen.wordpress.com/2023/07/21/computational-complexity-of-texture-encoding/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg" style="width ：220px；高度：221px；” />;<br />;大多数标准纹理压缩格式使用算法矢量量化来确定码本条目。编码过程的计算并不复杂，因为问题的大小是有限的并且各个块的编码是独立的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#computational-complexity-of-texture-encoding" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822329" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
